node.display_long_description:
Meet, chat, watch content, and share your photos with real people from around the globe with vTime XR - the world's first cross-reality social network.
 
Completely cross-platform, vTime XR makes it possible to socialize with friends from anywhere in the world, inside stunning virtual destinations or your own 360 photos.

User feedback: 
“I would say vTime is definitely the most presence-inducing app available right now” 
“One of the most incredible apps for VR” 

• Meet, chat and share in amazing VR destinations 
• Watch exciting video content with friends in vTime XR Theaters
• Share photos or sit with friends inside 360 images
• Experience lifelike 360 sound with DTS:X® Game Audi
• Private message vTime friends with vText
• Millions of avatar customization options 
• Users in over 190 countries

*NOT COMPATIBLE WITH BLUETOOTH HEADSETS. PLEASE USE WIRED EARBUDS/HEADPHONES*

*AR MODE NOT AVAILABLE FOR QUEST

latest_supported_binary.change_log: Relaxed the out-of-bounds threshold for Quest users.

node.reviewDescription:
This is the best app for actual conversations with people without all the silliness and randomness of other apps. The locations are stunning with lots of cool surprises and unlike other apps, here you are with just 3 other people and can have decent grown up conversations with strangers if you don’t have any real friends online or who own headsets.

The avatar creation is the best I’ve seen and you can go to any of the cool “destinations” and soon people will ask to join and you can accept them and have interesting conversations with people from all over the world.  If you are the host, you can kick anyone out if they become a problem. I haven’t tried joining others yet but it was fun being a host to random strangers and finding out a bit about them. Being confined to four people and not able to move around leads to better conversations. When my headset was about to die I gave host duties to someone else and he put up a video screen with some silly video but no one seemed to know if we could add our own videos or go online or watch our own streaming accounts. If that’s not there, I hope it’s added. 

The one issue I had a problem with was my controllers. My arms were moving out of control at times, even when I put down the controllers, my avatar’s arms were still moving. If this is fixed I’ll move it up to five stars. 

I always feel uncomfortable walking up to strangers in other social apps and starting conversations, but with this, I can just host a room and accept guests to join me. Even if I’m alone for awhile, the locations are so cool, I can just relax in them and look around.

developerResponse.body: Hey Alicia, thanks for your review! Happy to hear that you're able to have some great conversations and alone time in vTime XR. In terms of your controller issue, we've found that our controllers can behave like this in vTime or other apps when the lighting isn't great or the battery is low, but we'll try to reproduce in the studio.

Meet, chat, watch content, and share your photos with real people from around the globe in vTime XR - the world's first cross-reality (XR) social network
 
Socialize with friends from anywhere in the world, inside stunning virtual destinations or your own 360 photos

• Watch incredible content in Theaters

• Millions of customization combinations

website_page_meta.title: vTime XR · Oculus Quest
